definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: The Earth rotates from west-to-east on its axis.
sentences.chinese: 地球围着地轴自西向东转。

sentences.english: Middle the Kang Yunnan earth axis sticks out for the anteklise, big area appearing platform basis.
sentences.chinese: 康滇地轴中部为台背斜隆起，大面积出露地台基底。

sentences.english: The Honghuagou area of Chifeng City is tectonically located on the northern margin of the Inner Mongolian axis.
sentences.chinese: 其大地构造位置在华北地台北缘内蒙地轴东部。

sentences.english: The earth spins around on its axis as it travels around the sun.
sentences.chinese: 地球绕地轴自转的方向和它绕太阳公转的一样。

sentences.english: Earlier great earthquakes also changed the axis and shortened the day.
sentences.chinese: 先前的地震同样改变了地轴，缩短了白天。

sentences.english: In the earth axis has the protector has when the clamping disc the protective function.
sentences.chinese: 地轴内有保险装置在夹紧盘具时起保护作用。

sentences.english: The earth spins round the sun, and on its own axis.
sentences.chinese: 地球围绕太阳旋转，并以地轴作自转。

sentences.english: The problem, though, is that the Earth's tilt on its axis has shifted significantly since then.
sentences.chinese: 问题是，地球地轴已经明显的倾斜了。

sentences.english: The Earth moves around the sun and spins on its slanting axis at the same time.
sentences.chinese: 地球在绕着倾斜地轴自转的同时也是绕着太阳分转。

sentences.english: Perhaps more impressive is how much the quake shifted Earth's axis.
sentences.chinese: 也许更令人印象深刻的是地震使地轴偏移了多少。

definition: to rotate about an axis/axis of rotation (math.)
angle of intersection/angle at which two lines meet
perihelion, the nearest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun/lower apsis
